verses.text: \w Open|strong="H6605"\w* thy \w gates|strong="H1817"\w*, O Libanus, \w and|strong="H0398"\w* let \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* \w devour|strong="H0398"\w* thy \w cedars|strong="H0730"\w*.

\w Howl|strong="H3213"\w*, thou \w fir|strong="H1265"\w* tree, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w cedar|strong="H0730"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w fallen|strong="H5307"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w mighty|strong="H0117"\w* \w are|strong="H0834"\w* laid \w waste|strong="H5307"\w*: \w howl|strong="H3213"\w*, ye \w oaks|strong="H0437"\w* \w of|strong="H0730"\w* Basan, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* fenced \w forest|strong="H3293"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* cut \w down|strong="H3381"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3588"\w* \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* \w of|strong="H6963"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* howling \w of|strong="H6963"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w shepherds|strong="H7462"\w*, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w their|strong="H3588"\w* \w glory|strong="H0155"\w* \w is|strong="H6963"\w* laid \w waste|strong="H7703"\w*: \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* \w of|strong="H6963"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w roaring|strong="H7581"\w* \w of|strong="H6963"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w lions|strong="H3715"\w*, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w pride|strong="H1347"\w* \w of|strong="H6963"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w* \w is|strong="H6963"\w* spoiled.

\w Thus|strong="H3541"\w* saith \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*: \w Feed|strong="H7462"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w flock|strong="H6629"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w slaughter|strong="H2028"\w*,

\w And|strong="H6629"\w* \w I|strong="H3651"\w* \w will|strong="H6629"\w* \w feed|strong="H7462"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* hock \w of|strong="H0259"\w* \w slaughter|strong="H2028"\w* \w for|strong="H7121"\w* \w this|strong="H3651"\w*, O ye \w poor|strong="H6041"\w* \w of|strong="H0259"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* dock. \w And|strong="H6629"\w* \w I|strong="H3651"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* unto \w me|strong="H7121"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w rods|strong="H4731"\w*, \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w I|strong="H3651"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* \w Beauty|strong="H5278"\w*, \w and|strong="H6629"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w other|strong="H0259"\w* \w I|strong="H3651"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* \w a|strong="H3947"\w* \w Cord|strong="H2256"\w*, \w and|strong="H6629"\w* \w I|strong="H3651"\w* fed \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w flock|strong="H6629"\w*.

\w And|strong="H5315"\w* \w I|strong="H5315"\w* \w cut|strong="H3582"\w* \w off|strong="H3582"\w* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w shepherds|strong="H7462"\w* \w in|strong="H5315"\w* \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w month|strong="H3391"\w*, \w and|strong="H5315"\w* \w my|strong="H1571"\w* \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* \w was|strong="H0259"\w* straitened \w in|strong="H5315"\w* \w their|strong="H1571"\w* regard: \w for|strong="H0259"\w* \w their|strong="H1571"\w* \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* \w also|strong="H1571"\w* varied \w in|strong="H5315"\w* \w my|strong="H1571"\w* regard.

\w And|strong="H0398"\w* \w I|strong="H0559"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w I|strong="H0559"\w* \w will|strong="H1320"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w feed|strong="H0398"\w* \w you|strong="H3808"\w*: \w that|strong="H0559"\w* \w which|strong="H0802"\w* dieth, \w let|strong="H3808"\w* \w it|strong="H0398"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w*: \w and|strong="H0398"\w* \w that|strong="H0559"\w* \w which|strong="H0802"\w* \w is|strong="H1320"\w* \w cut|strong="H3582"\w* \w off|strong="H3582"\w*, \w let|strong="H3808"\w* \w it|strong="H0398"\w* \w be|strong="H4191"\w* \w cut|strong="H3582"\w* \w off|strong="H3582"\w*: \w and|strong="H0398"\w* \w let|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w rest|strong="H7604"\w* \w devour|strong="H0398"\w* \w every|strong="H0802"\w* \w one|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* \w of|strong="H0802"\w* \w his|strong="H3808"\w* neighbour.

\w And|strong="H1285"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w rod|strong="H4731"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w was|strong="H0834"\w* called \w Beauty|strong="H5278"\w*, \w and|strong="H1285"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w cut|strong="H3772"\w* \w it|strong="H3947"\w* \w asunder|strong="H1438"\w* \w to|strong="H0854"\w* \w make|strong="H3772"\w* void \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w*, \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w had|strong="H0834"\w* \w made|strong="H3772"\w* \w with|strong="H0854"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w made|strong="H3045"\w* void \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w so|strong="H3651"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w poor|strong="H6041"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w flock|strong="H6629"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w me|strong="H8104"\w*, \w understood|strong="H3045"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3701"\w* \w I|strong="H0518"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w*: \w If|strong="H0518"\w* \w it|strong="H0518"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w your|strong="H0518"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*, \w bring|strong="H3051"\w* hither \w my|strong="H0518"\w* \w wages|strong="H7939"\w*: \w and|strong="H3701"\w* \w if|strong="H0518"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w*, \w be|strong="H3808"\w* quiet. \w And|strong="H3701"\w* \w they|strong="H0518"\w* \w weighed|strong="H8254"\w* \w for|strong="H0413"\w* \w my|strong="H0518"\w* \w wages|strong="H7939"\w* \w thirty|strong="H7970"\w* pieces \w of|strong="H5869"\w* \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w*: \w Cast|strong="H7993"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* statuary, \w a|strong="H3947"\w* handsome \w price|strong="H3701"\w*, \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w was|strong="H0834"\w* prized \w at|strong="H0413"\w* \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w*. \w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w thirty|strong="H7970"\w* pieces \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w cast|strong="H7993"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w* \w into|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* statuary.

\w And|strong="H3063"\w* \w I|strong="H3478"\w* \w cut|strong="H1438"\w* \w off|strong="H1438"\w* \w my|strong="H0996"\w* \w second|strong="H8145"\w* \w rod|strong="H4731"\w* \w that|strong="H3478"\w* \w was|strong="H3478"\w* called \w a|strong="H0996"\w* \w Cord|strong="H2256"\w*, \w that|strong="H3478"\w* \w I|strong="H3478"\w* \w might|strong="H3478"\w* \w break|strong="H6565"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w brotherhood|strong="H0264"\w* \w between|strong="H0996"\w* Juda \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w*: \w Take|strong="H3947"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* thee \w yet|strong="H5750"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w instruments|strong="H3627"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3947"\w* \w foolish|strong="H0196"\w* \w shepherd|strong="H7462"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w behold|strong="H2009"\w* \w I|strong="H0595"\w* \w will|strong="H0776"\w* \w raise|strong="H6965"\w* \w up|strong="H6965"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w shepherd|strong="H7462"\w* \w in|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, \w who|strong="H0776"\w* \w shall|strong="H0776"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w visit|strong="H6485"\w* \w what|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H0776"\w* forsaken, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w seek|strong="H1245"\w* \w what|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H0776"\w* \w scattered|strong="H5289"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w heal|strong="H7495"\w* \w what|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H0776"\w* \w broken|strong="H7665"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w nourish|strong="H3557"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* which standeth, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H0776"\w* \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w fat|strong="H1277"\w* ones, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w break|strong="H7665"\w* \w their|strong="H3588"\w* \w hoofs|strong="H6541"\w*.

O \w shepherd|strong="H7473"\w*, \w and|strong="H5869"\w* idol, \w that|strong="H5869"\w* forsaketh \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w flock|strong="H6629"\w*: \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w arm|strong="H2220"\w* \w and|strong="H5869"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w right|strong="H3225"\w* \w eye|strong="H5869"\w*: \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w arm|strong="H2220"\w* \w shall|strong="H2719"\w* quite \w wither|strong="H3001"\w* away, \w and|strong="H5869"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w right|strong="H3225"\w* \w eye|strong="H5869"\w* \w shall|strong="H2719"\w* \w be|strong="H5869"\w* utterly darkened.
